Gardena.Centinela Hospital Medical Center:
Centinela Hospital Medical Center is a care non profit hospital located in Inglewood, California United States.


== History ==
The hospital serves 369 beds, and also offers a level II emergency department, orthopedic care, advanced cardiac services, peripheral artery disease treatment and OB/GYN services.


== Prime Healthcare Services ==
Prior to being purchased by Prime Healthcare Services in 2007, the hospital was linked to the Daniel Freemnan Campus.
